Articles.Content:
Hi, I'm trying to install Vaughn's Astroniki Sunflare for Stock KSP using CKAN but I am not managing to make it show up in the game. I have also installed Scatterer and Scatterer Sunflare as required. Any ideas of what I can try to do about it? Here's the full list of mods I am using:

Many, many thanks!!

Edited May 19, 2021 by gilbertohasnofb
adding tags

I managed to solve this. Instead of using the package "Vaughn's Astroniki Sunflare for Stock KSP", I set CKAN to be compatible with mods down to version 1.2 of the game and then I installed "Astroniki Sunflare for Scatterer". When installing it, it removed "Scatterer sunflare" as expected. Now everything works as expected.

On 6/4/2021 at 12:17 PM, gilbertohasnofb said:

I managed to solve this. Instead of using the package "Vaughn's Astroniki Sunflare for Stock KSP", I set CKAN to be compatible with mods down to version 1.2 of the game and then I installed "Astroniki Sunflare for Scatterer". When installing it, it removed "Scatterer sunflare" as expected. Now everything works as expected.

Sorry for the thread necro, but someone just linked to this post.  Rather than changing CKAN's compatibility settings, you should click on the mod you want and then click on the versions tab on the right.  You can check the box to install it there without blanket-allowing all older mods (which is sure to cause issues).

Some recent updates to scatterer broke some older sunflare mods.  They're not really incompatible, just the structure of the cfg files changed a bit.  If an older version works, it's probably fine to use.
